remarks: Closure of an operation on reals.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
genp.1 $e |- F = ( w e. P. , v e. P. |-> { x | E. y e. w E. z e. v x = ( y G z ) } ) $.
genp.2 $e |- ( ( y e. Q. /\ z e. Q. ) -> ( y G z ) e. Q. ) $.
genpcl.3 $e |- ( h e. Q. -> ( f <Q g <-> ( h G f ) <Q ( h G g ) ) ) $.
genpcl.4 $e |- ( x G y ) = ( y G x ) $.
genpcl.5 $e |- ( ( ( ( A e. P. /\ g e. A ) /\ ( B e. P. /\ h e. B ) ) /\ x e. Q. ) -> ( x <Q ( g G h ) -> x e. ( A F B ) ) ) $.
genpcl $p |- ( ( A e. P. /\ B e. P. ) -> ( A F B ) e. P. ) $.
$d A f g h v w x y z $.
$d B f g h v w x y z $.
$d F f g h v w x y $.
$d G f g h v w x y z $.
